animeDescription: The Lancer EVO-driving group "Emperor" have defeated every racing team they've met in the Gunma region. Now they're out to challenge the duo of Mako and Sayuki and their SilEighty - the Impact Blue of Usui Mountain.   (Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Initial D Second Stage', 'Initial D Third Stage', 'Initial D Extra Stage 2']
